item.title: What do Arab Muslims think about ISIS (Daesh)?
item.description: Here I want to dive a little bit into how Arab Muslims see Daesh (a term for ISIS often used by Arabic speakers). The data I will be using is from the Arab Barometer Wave 4, released just a few weeks ago.
